text: Hi Snaedis yes I would like it.Thanks. my problem is solved . I used this tutorial  <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/how-to-build-dynamic-pages-with-hubdb> and have help from <@UFH0PPMEW> who suggested to create 2 DB instead of one with translate colums and translate the pages with the respective language , connect the DB for each pages.this work .

Oh, I see — I misunderstood, didn’t realize you were talking about HubDB (thought you meant testing pages). Multi-language HubDB is not planned yet, but we know it’s something we’ll need to do in the future.
Glad you figured it out!
